der, die, das: eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs, sieben, acht, neun, zehn

the, that, those, which, who, this one: on, at, on top of, in
through, divided by, by means of

der, die, das: sein (ich bin, du bist, es ist, wir sind, ihr seid, sie sind, Sie sind) war, gewesen

the, that, those, which, who, this one: however, still, on the contrary, as a flavor word, it can add emphasis
So, what are you all doing here?
What do people do here? What does one do here?
What is your name? Lit. How are you called?
This one or that one there?

It's a good thing that you are here.

der, die, das: Ich bin ich und du bist du.
the, that, those, which, who, this one: I am me and you are you.

der, die, das: Wo war er? Wo ist er gewesen?
